nodes.text: Broadside was the Wookiee bartender at the Starboard Broadside Club, a cantina aboard Omze's Incredible Traveling Starport. He was overweight and several patches of missing hair due to scars from injuries taken during his life as a gladiator. His past was unknown, but the rumor was he had fought alongside Omze in the gladiator pits of Loovria.
He kept peace in his club by using his immense strength and a large metal pipe he kept behind the bar.
